name: I forgot my password
description:
This is a 5mins simple puzzle game about Alzheimer's disease. Your goal is to find out the truth while finding back your computer PIN.

This is my first video game,I'm still learning. It's not done yet so there will be a lot of bugs...and I haven't started with shader or other details（added!221204）, sorry for all that, thank you for playing!!

This is a test player Questionnaire: https://www.wjx.cn/vm/tXFrmuY.aspx# (CHN/ENG) Thank you for filling it! (same as the QRcode below)

2022/12/03 Ver. 0.2: Fixed some bugs; Changed the plot; Changed some dialogs.

2022/12/04 Ver. 0.3: Added A LOT of details; Scene design; other things... 

2022/12/04 Ver. 0.31: Added Post-Processing，a bit worried about the effects

2022/12/04 Ver. 0.32: Changed Partical

2022/12/05 Ver. 0.33: Changed Player settings（windowed）
